minRequestFrequency.title: Minimum Request Frequency
minRequestFrequency.description: Maximum time to cache AC status data in milli seconds (0-1000)

updateInterval.title: Status Update Interval
updateInterval.description: How many seconds between periodic updates (2 - 30)

auto.title: Auto Switch
auto.description: Aircon Auto Mode switch. Switch On to set AC to Auto (and power on), switch Off to turn AC off

selfClean.title: Self Clean Switch
selfClean.description: Aircon Self-Clean switch. Controls self clean function

display.title: LED Display Switch
display.description: LED and Beep switch. Controls the Beep/LED Display (note, the AC re-enables the beep - use De-Beep for long term solution)

fanSwing.title: Fan Swing Switch
fanSwing.description: Fan Swing/Oscillate switch. Enables Air Oscillation on the AC, in addition to the controls via the Fan accessory

quietAuto.title: Quiet Auto Switch
quietAuto.description: Aircon Auto Mode switch, but sets the Fan to Quiet Mode

deBeep.title: De-Beep Switch
deBeep.description: This switch tells the plugin to turn off the LED/Beep every time the AC turns on, which is when the AC re-enables the LED/Beep. You'll always get a beep when powering on, but with De-Beep it shouldnt beep after that

fanMode.title: Fan Mode Switch
fanMode.description: Aircon Fan Mode switch. Switch On to set AC to Fan Mode (and power on), switch Off to turn AC off. Similar but slightly different to the behavior of the Fan Accessory that is created for the AC by this plugin

dryMode.title: Dry Mode Switch
dryMode.description: Aircon Dry Mode switch. Switch On to set AC to Dry Mode (and power on), switch Off to turn AC off.

name.title: Name
name.description: When discovered, this name will be used instead of the default

macAddress.title: MAC Address
macAddress.description: The device with this MAC address will have these names applied

model.title: Model
model.description: Enter a custom model number to be displayed in the device properties

manufacturer.title: Manufacturer
manufacturer.description: Enter the manufacturer to be displayed in the device properties

items.title: Allow other Broadlink Device Types
items.description: This allows other Broadlink device types to be used. Expect the unexpected.
